title: Giving Yourself Grace When You're a 'Bad' Migraine Patient

content: WebMD’s migraine blogger Michele Jordan talks about being a “bad patient” in her blog post about why we do things we know might cause a migraine – and how she helps her body heal afterward a bad decision. Or two.  “I do try to give myself grace.”
READ: Migraine Episodes and Self-Destructive Behavior: Why Do I Do These Things?

meta_description: Even if we know all the right things to do, we’re still human. We may eat a bunch of chocolate or pull an all-nighter. And that can trigger a migraine.
